plot: A 5,000-year-old pyramid appears overnight, baffling everyone including the Doctor.

A 5000 year old pyramid is in the middle of the United States, Chinese, and Russian armies; but the problem is that the pyramid was not there the day before. The world seeks The Doctor and names it the president of the world again to deal with this extraterrestrial beings that say that want to help mankind from imminent disaster but for such feat they have to let them rule the earth. The previously mentioned armies make an alliance to tackle the probable threat that could be faced on earth by this so called monks. What is the impending doom that the planet faces and will mankind let this mysterious monks rule the earth?—Jose Benavides
